SEARCH
程序包 com.se.aiconomy.server.storage.service.impl

类 JSONStorageServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.se.aiconomy.server.storage.service.impl.JSONStorageServiceImpl
所有已实现的接口:
JSONStorageService
public class JSONStorageServiceImpl extends Object implements JSONStorageService
Implementation of the JSONStorageService interface using JsonDBTemplate for JSON-based storage.

This class provides CRUD operations for entities implementing the Identifiable interface, utilizing a singleton pattern for service instantiation. It supports collection initialization, insertion, update, deletion, upsert, and retrieval operations, with optional encryption support.

      public static JSONStorageService getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of JSONStorageService. If the instance does not exist, it is created with the loaded configuration.
      返回:
      the singleton JSONStorageService instance

    • insert

      public <T extends Identifiable> T insert(T entity)
      Inserts a new entity into the storage. If the entity does not have an ID, a new UUID is generated.
      指定者:

      类型参数:

      参数:

      返回:
      the inserted entity with an assigned ID
